name: It Hunts You
description:
Alone in the cell

You were spared the fate of the others

Perhaps a worse one awaits

It hunts you

Short, low-fi prototype horror game for #HPS1Jam

Controls are displayed upon loading the game. Study them well. Controller reccomended.

Perhaps you will escape. Perhaps more will follow.
